text: Rodrigo Eduardo Tapia Contreras (born 13 March 1988) was a Chilean footballer. ==Club career== Tapia made his debut with Colo-Colo in 2006, appearing in three games and scoring one goal. He represented the Chilean national team at the U-17 level in 2005. In the 2006 Clasura Tournament 2006 quarterfinals, Tapia along with many other youth players got their chance to shine because the first-team regulars were in Mexico waiting for their Copa Sudamericana 2006 match. Tapia took full advantage of the moment and scored in Colo-Colo's surprise victory over Puerto Montt, 1–0. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Colo-Colo * Primera División de Chile (2): 2006 Apertura, 2006 Clausura ==External links== * BDFA profile *Tapia Picture Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Chilean footballers Category:Ñublense footballers Category:Colo-Colo footballers Category:Deportes Iquique footballers Category:San Antonio Unido footballers Category:C.D. title: Rodrigo Tapia (footballer, born 1988)
